dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 2018 IH: To ensure that the Metropolitan Washington Airports Authority complies with auditing standards.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Norton introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To ensure that the Metropolitan Washington Airports Authority complies with auditing standards.

section.text: No Federal funds may be made available to the Metropolitan Washington Airports Authority unless the Secretary of the Department of Transportation certifies that the Metropolitan Washington Airports Authority is complying with appropriate auditing standards.
